import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import { Form, Button, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import { login } from '../actions/userActions' const LoginScreen = ({ location, history }) => { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin) const { loading, error, userInfo } = userLogin const redirect = location.search ? location.search.split('=')[1] : '/' useEffect(() => { if (userInfo) { history.push(redirect) } }, [history, userInfo, redirect]) const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(login(email, password)) } return ( < FormContainer initial= {{ opacity:0,x: 2, y: 2, z :2 }} animate={{ opacity:1, x: 0, y: 0, z :0}} transition= {{duration: 1}}>

Sign In

{error && {error}} {loading && }
Email Address setEmail(e.target.value)} > Password setPassword(e.target.value)} >

Welcome Back

Log in to your account using email and password

 ) } export default LoginScreen
